\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 69120}

\subsection*{Works Well For My Insomnia}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Kat}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 100 mg & oral & Pharms - Trazodone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 250.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have been taking Trazodone off and on for insomnia or about 7 years. It works well, is not addictive, and has no recreational use. However, it gives me absolutely insane dreams. I normally have vivid dreams but the nightmares with Trazodone are more intense. But hell, at least I sleep.

\end{document}
